## **Degree Name:** [BSc International Economics and Finance](https://www.unibocconi.eu/wps/wcm/connect/Bocconi/SitoPubblico_EN/Navigation+Tree/Home/programs/bachelor+of+science/International+Economics+and+Finance/)
### Please find the programme structure below. By clicking on each course name you can directly view the course syllabus
##### **Semester I**: [Mathematics](https://didattica.unibocconi.eu/ts/tsn_anteprima.php?cod_ins=30062&anno=2020&IdPag=6203), [Management](https://didattica.unibocconi.eu/ts/tsn_anteprima.php?cod_ins=30060&anno=2020&IdPag=6203), [Microeconomics](https://didattica.unibocconi.eu/ts/tsn_anteprima.php?cod_ins=30065&anno=2020&IdPag=6203), [Critical Thinking Seminar](https://didattica.unibocconi.eu/ts/tsn_anteprima.php?cod_ins=30527&anno=2020&IdPag=6203)

##### **Semester II**: [Macroeconomics](https://didattica.unibocconi.eu/ts/tsn_anteprima.php?cod_ins=30066&anno=2020&IdPag=6203), [Computer Science](https://didattica.unibocconi.eu/ts/tsn_anteprima.php?cod_ins=30424&anno=2020&IdPag=6203), [Applied Mathematics](https://didattica.unibocconi.eu/ts/tsn_anteprima.php?cod_ins=30063&anno=2020&IdPag=6203), [Private Law](https://didattica.unibocconi.eu/ts/tsn_anteprima.php?cod_ins=30428&anno=2020&IdPag=6203), [English](https://didattica.unibocconi.eu/ts/tsn_anteprima.php?cod_ins=30301&anno=2020&IdPag=6203)

##### **Semester III**: [Economic History](https://didattica.unibocconi.eu/ts/tsn_anteprima.php?cod_ins=30067&anno=2020&IdPag=6203), [Accounting Module 1](https://didattica.unibocconi.eu/ts/tsn_anteprima.php?cod_ins=30426&anno=2020&IdPag=6203), [Financial Markets And Institutions](https://didattica.unibocconi.eu/ts/tsn_anteprima.php?cod_ins=30006&anno=2020&IdPag=6203), [Statistics](https://didattica.unibocconi.eu/ts/tsn_anteprima.php?cod_ins=30001&anno=2020&IdPag=6203), [Public Law](https://didattica.unibocconi.eu/ts/tsn_anteprima.php?cod_ins=30048&anno=2020&IdPag=6203)

##### **Semester IV**: [Accounting Module 2](https://didattica.unibocconi.eu/ts/tsn_anteprima.php?cod_ins=30427&anno=2020&IdPag=6203), [Corporate Finance](https://didattica.unibocconi.eu/ts/tsn_anteprima.php?cod_ins=30017&anno=2020&IdPag=6203), [Italiano](https://didattica.unibocconi.eu/ts/tsn_anteprima.php?cod_ins=30308&anno=2020&IdPag=6203), [International and Monetary Economics](https://didattica.unibocconi.eu/ts/tsn_anteprima.php?cod_ins=30054&anno=2020&IdPag=62033), [Financial Economics](https://didattica.unibocconi.eu/ts/tsn_anteprima.php?cod_ins=30055&anno=2020&IdPag=6203)

##### **Semester V**: [CSR & Ethics in Business](https://didattica.unibocconi.eu/ts/tsn_anteprima.php?cod_ins=30281&anno=2020&IdPag=6203), [Econometrics for Finance](https://didattica.unibocconi.eu/ts/tsn_anteprima.php?cod_ins=30285&anno=2020&IdPag=6203), [International Banking](https://didattica.unibocconi.eu/ts/tsn_anteprima.php?cod_ins=30178&anno=2020&IdPag=6203), [Management of Financial Institutions](https://didattica.unibocconi.eu/ts/tsn_anteprima.php?cod_ins=30148&anno=2020&IdPag=6203), [Principles of International Finance](https://didattica.unibocconi.eu/ts/tsn_anteprima.php?cod_ins=30151&anno=2020&IdPag=6203), [Corporate Valuation](https://didattica.unibocconi.eu/ts/tsn_anteprima.php?cod_ins=30257&anno=2020&IdPag=6203)

##### **Semester VI**: [Globalization, Societies, and Institutions](https://didattica.unibocconi.eu/ts/tsn_anteprima.php?cod_ins=30282&anno=2020&IdPag=6203), [European Law](https://didattica.unibocconi.eu/ts/tsn_anteprima.php?cod_ins=30058&anno=2020&IdPag=6203), [Developlment Economics](https://didattica.unibocconi.eu/ts/tsn_anteprima.php?cod_ins=30145&anno=2020&IdPag=6203), [Business Strategy](https://didattica.unibocconi.eu/ts/tsn_anteprima.php?cod_ins=30012&anno=2020&IdPag=6203)
